infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: RaahVia needs access to your camera to scan QR codes for indoor navigation.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: RaahVia uses motion sensors to track your steps on the map.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: RaahVia uses speech recognition for voice-guided search.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: RaahVia uses the microphone for voice commands.
